views.markdown:
- Fixed " Too many calls " issue - Adjusted view for iPhone X - Updated to iOS 11 - Fixed configuration issue with the new TrueCaller app *This is a required update to all devices*
- Added support to iOS 10
- Fixed 'No Matches Found' issue
- Improved search results to lookup more info about the Caller ID
- Improved PhoneCaller configurating to be faster
- Fixed right to left language support in phone.app
- Fixed issue with iOS 7 devices
-- Fixed issue with iOS 8 ( Tweak not working at all )

** NEW FEATURE **
- Now you can save the identified number's caller id to your contacts book right away when using swipe feature in recent calls or phonecaller's button in Phone.app keypad
Fixed issue with not showing caller info in call screen

** NEW FEATURE **
- Now you can save the identified number's caller id to your contacts book right away when using swipe feature in recent calls or phonecaller's button in Phone.app keypad

- Fixed minor issue with CallBar UI compatibility
- Fixed right to left language devices from cropping caller's name ( Arabic, Hebrew .. )

- Supporting iOS 9.2 - 9.3
Added support to last truecaller version
( Apologises for delay and it was a reason for most of you getting "unable to make search" and such errors)

--

Added support for 9.2-9.3
Added a new button while in call to re-establish connection to get caller id. — Support for latest truecaller version ( 6.30 )

===== Version 1.3.0 =====
Introducing the all new search-before-dialing feature
Now you can search right before dialing, with the new added search button in the dialer page in Phone application, You can search before making the call !
Introducing the all new search-before-dialing feature

Now you can search right before dialing, with the new added search button in the dialer page in Phone application, You can search before making the call !
- Fixed most lookups that could return invalid "No matches found"
- Improved configuring technique to work more accurately

===== Version 1.2.4 =====
- Fixed configuring issue
- Fixed deleting contact from recents crash

===== Version 1.2.2 =====
iOS 9 Support
===== Version 1.2.1 =====
- Fixed crashes.

===== Version 1.2 =====
— Introducing the all new identify-inside-logs feature:
Now you can identify caller’s ID right from call logs ( recents tab in Phone.app ), Swipe left on any caller’s id from recents and use the new PhoneCaller button, It will flawlessly and quickly give you the full caller ID.
— Fixed image appearing blank
— Minor improvements

===== Version 1.1-2 =====
— Fixed Gulf countries issue ( KSA, UAE and Kuwait )
— Fixed facetime issue and other crash.

===== Version 1.1 =====
— Added support for iOS 7
— Added complete support for CallBar
— Added support for latest TrueCaller version
— Introducing the new Compact Mode, displays Caller ID as a plain text.
— New customization options
Set background transparency
Choose from new different styles
— Performance has been improved to become more reliable and fast
— Improved “Show for contacts” option
— Added longer duration options
— Promo video for PhoneCaller is now available shows live action of the tweak
— Re-fixed private calls crash
— Fixed hanging screen problem
— Major stability improvements overall
Changelog v1.0.3:
- Fixed error in search for Saudi Arabia users
- Fixed crash occurred in Private/Blocked Number calls

Changelog v1.0.2:

- Fixed Crashes.

Changelog v1.0.1:
- Fixed a bug that doesn't make Caller ID appear for received calls and most other calls
- 'Show For Contacts' option has been improved to work more accurately.
